Articles.Content:
I'm not really sure if screenshots count as artwork, but oh well!

Here, I was just floatin' around Minmus and thought that I might take a picture.

Enjoy!
Why not zoom in so we can see the craft
It's a cool picture, but no, screenshots probably don't count as artwork. Those should be posted in the dedicated screenshot thread in General Discussion instead.
Oh, what you could do is add some after-effects, or maybe some explosions

It's a cool picture, but no, screenshots probably don't count as artwork. Those should be posted in the dedicated screenshot thread in General Discussion instead.

I was tired when I posted this and didn't look too thouroughly. ha! Thanks for the info! I now know where to post future screenshots.
No problem! Everyone makes mistakes once in a while. However, you could manipulate it or perhaps even recreate it as a drawing if you feel like it.
